# File lib/rio.rb, line 75
75:     def self.rio(*args,&block) # :yields: self
76:       ario = new(*args)
77:       if block_given?
78:         old_closeoncopy = ario.closeoncopy?
79:         begin
80:           yield ario.nocloseoncopy
81:         ensure
82:           ario.reset.closeoncopy(old_closeoncopy)
83:         end
84:       end
85:       ario
86:     end
